question: The annual International Film Festival of India (IFFI) of the year 2020, was scheduled to be held in which state/UT?
explanation:
The 51st edition of the annual International Film Festival of India (IFFI) which was originally scheduled to start from November 20 in Goa has been postponed to next year.
Amid the coronavirus pandemic, the festival has been postponed to 16th to 24th January 2021. It was also announced that the festival would be organised in Hybrid format of virtual and physical formats. The 14th edition of NFDC Film Bazaar Online 2020 has been postponed to January, 2021.
